title: Owning Bipolar: A Conversation with Michael Pipich - Part 1
itunes:title: Owning Bipolar: A Conversation with Michael Pipich - Part 1
description: Bipolar (previously known as "manic depression") is often a difficult disorder to diagnose, much less to live with. If you have been diagnosed with bipolar or know someone who has, this episode is for you. Michael Pipich brings his 30 years of experience together in his new book, Owning Bipolar. In part 1 of my interview with him, we discuss what exactly is bipolar and why it is difficult to diagnose.
